alert.note: Alert for Kohala; Kona; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 02 at 9:52AM HST until December 02 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI HAS BEEN CANCELLED... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM TODAY... .The large, long period west northwest swell (300-310 degrees) that peaked last night will continue to slowly subside through today. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 15 feet for north-facing Oahu and Molokai shores, 8 to 12 feet west-facing Oahu and Molokai shores, and 6 to 8 feet along west-facing Big Island shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Oahu and Molokai. West- facing shores of Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kohala; Kona; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
